text: A Chinese Mandarin once proposed this measure to the governor of a province, who soon adopted it. Just as the victim was to lay his head on the heel so that the executioner could cut it off, a decorated gentleman would approach the gallows and exclaim: "Stop! The Sire has granted his grace to the condemned to death! In that moment of supreme euphoria, the executioner cut off the head of the happy mortal. Finish Philosophical Tales, 1971
title: ﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿La muerte
author: Costas Axelos
